name: Dino Party (Luxon5)
description: An example GDevelop game for April 2022 Example Jam. Similar to Mario party, four players move around the board by rolling a die. Cards can be collected by landing on spaces or buying from a shop. These cards activate a few abilities. The end of each round goes to a randomized minigame selector. No minigames are implemented for this example, but the board game side can be played to completion against up to 3 AI bots.
